des: "Even if you don't like pumpkin pie you will really like this one.  Its an old, old recipe, but good.  It is a 1950's recipe of my mothers. For a beautiful presentation, top each slice with a dollop of whipped cream and a walnut half."
ins: Combine pumpkin, brown sugar, salt, and spices with a rotary beater.  Blend in ice cream.  Pour into pie shell.  Freeze until firm.  Serve frozen, garnished with whipped cream and walnut halves.
